app.name: BlueMsx Lite Wii
app.long_description: First preview of a BlueMsx port for Wii. On the SD-Card there must be a 'MSX' directory which will beused as the BlueMsx working directory with the machine definitions and stuff. Currently a file 'cmdline.txt' in the working directory is used to feed command line arguments to the emulator (e.g. /DiskA image.dsk).
